name: Pathfinder
description: An interactive web app that visualizes pathfinding algorithms to demonstrate performance of various algorithms to better understand their strengths and weaknesses.

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: A multiplayer Tic-Tac-Toe web app. Implements multiplayer using Pocketbase for game state synchronization between 2 players. Submitted as the final project for my web frontend class.

name: ACM at CSUF Website
description: The website for the Association for Computing Machinery chapter at CSUF. Much of my work here is as a maintainer, primarily testing and reviewing pull requests or mentoring any members looking to contribute

name: Tuffyhacks Website
description: A full stack landing page and hacker portal for Tuffyhacks 2022. Supports event scheduling and team creation via invite link.

name: Spotify Seasonal Playlist Sorter
description: A web app that automatically places a users liked songs into playlists grouped by seasons every 10 minutes, for instance, a "spring 2020" playlist

name: CSUFACS Website
description: The proof of concept website for the Association of Chinese Students at CSUF. Originally developed to promote the club and display weekly events but discontinued as I did not have the time to maintain it

name: osu! Collection Exporter
description: A web app that converts an osu! collections database into a list of beatmap links. Uses an in house made Javascript library to parse beatmap binary data

name: osu! Stream Speed Benchmark
description: The original web based stream speed benchmark. By far my most popular project, topping the Google search results and having 110 upvotes on Reddit

name: APPE Regional Draft Analysis
description: A program I wrote to run Monte Carlo draft pick simulations to forecast the probability of pharmacy students getting their preferred region for their Advanced Pharmacy Practice Experiences (APPE) rotations

name: SQLite Clone
description: A clone of SQLite supporting a small subset of SQL commands as well as fully featured syntax checking and an extensible command system. Implements a B+tree for indexing

name: Graphing Calculator
description: A graphing calculator application capable of graphing 2D cartesian equations. Implements the Shunting Yard algorithm to parse and evaluate user inputs

name: Sushi Shop
description: A sushi making game where players are given a randomized sushi order and must move a plate to catch falling ingredients to construct the order
